::Grimmler/Rex::

Grimmler looks over at Tails as she walks up (the hatch was open and Grimmler 
was talking with Sinister). There were more Maximals on the planet than he 
had thought. He scans the area as he recieves GoldenEye's transmission, 
frowning. He looks back at Tails.

"I assume you want to join us too?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex nods as Battera walks to her door. "Allright. Be carefull in the future, 
there are dangerous parts to this ship."

He turns around, walking back to the entrance and looking at Sinister.

"I'll show you two to your quarters," Rex says, looking at Sinister and 
Blizzard, "Follow me."
